templates.title: JunimoServer - Stardew Valley Dedicated Server
templates.description: 24/7 Stardew Valley dedicated server with web-based VNC administration, automatic backups, and SMAPI mod support. Supports up to 150 players with persistent saves and crop protection.
templates.note: Steam credentials are required for initial game download. Server supports up to 150 players and includes VNC access for management. Access VNC at http://yourserver:VNC_PORT after deployment. Initial setup takes 5-10 minutes.

env.name: GAME_PORT
env.label: Game Port
env.description: UDP port for Stardew Valley game connections

env.name: VNC_PORT
env.label: VNC Port
env.description: Port for web-based VNC administration interface

env.name: VNC_PASSWORD
env.label: VNC Password
env.description: Password for VNC web interface access (required for administration)

env.name: STEAM_USER
env.label: Steam Username
env.description: Steam account username (required for initial game download)

env.name: STEAM_PASS
env.label: Steam Password
env.description: Steam account password (required for initial game download)

env.name: STEAM_GUARD_CODE
env.label: Steam Guard Code
env.description: Steam Guard authentication code (leave empty if not using Steam Guard)

env.name: DISABLE_RENDERING
env.label: Disable Rendering
env.description: Disable game rendering for better performance on headless servers
